Inclined cold neutron beam hole IH1 of
A fast coincidence (30 nsec) is used to
detect the two fission fragment kinetic energies.
Simultaneously the difference of time of flight
of the fission fragments was also recorded. If the
difference between this measured TOF-difference and
the TOF-difference calculated from the measured
kinetic energies is less than a certain value, the
measurement is accepted. This procedure eliminates
contamination of the spectra from poorly measured
high yield events (e.g. from backscattered fission
-All target were deposited onto about 110 micro-grams
